summary: Comprehensive deep-dive into Thymeleaf template engine integration with Spring MVC. Covers all Thymeleaf attributes (th:text, th:if, th:each, th:object, th:field, th:action, th:href, th:errors, th:classappend), expression syntax ($, *, @, #), utility objects, form binding, validation error display, CSRF integration, and the complete request-response rendering cycle with real examples from the project.
